All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    Action
    represents a generalization of the actions that a worker can perform
    ActionFSM
    The FSM for the interaction with the user to select the action on board
    ActionFSM.ActionState
    The enumeration of states of an action to display on the GUI.
    ActionTree
    A tree of Actions.
    AlivenessHandler
    Contains all the utilities related to the monitoring of aliveness on the network.
    AlreadyFullException
    A runtime exception dealing with the state of an object being full.
    AnsiColors
    This class wraps the ANSI color strings for the CLI.
    ApolloPower
    Generate ActionTree and prune others ActionTrees for god Apollo
    ArtemisPower
    Generate ActionTree and prune others ActionTrees for god Artemis
    AskCardMenu
    Menu to choose all cards for the game
    AskGodMenu
    Menu to choose the own god
    AskIpAndPortMenu
    Menu to read server's IP and port
    AskNameMenu
    Menu to ask and read the name of the player
    AskNumPlayersMenu
    Menu to ask and get the number of player of the game
    AskRestoreMenu
    Menu to choose if restore an existed game
    AthenaPower
    Generate ActionTree and prune others ActionTrees for god Athena
    AtlasPower
    Generate ActionTree and prune others ActionTrees for god Atlas
    BidimensionalSelectionCLI
    Extends the SelectionCLI class for modeling bi-dimensional selections.
    Board
    Represents the actual game board of the game.
    Board
    The main class of GUI.
    BuildAction
    represents the action of building any type of building on a space
    Building
    A single 3D piece of GUI
    CanvasCLI
    Extends the RectangleCLI class with custom methods that allow the user to print the overlapped figures on the terminal.
    Card
    Represents an actual card of the game, associated with a specific god power.
    Cli
    The user interface class for command line.
    CliApp
    The launcher for the command line user interface.
    Client
    The client node in the client-server network architecture of the game.
    ClientView
    A class that takes the role of View in the MVC pattern on the client On the client, the Client class takes the role of both Controller and model and communicates with the ClientView accordingly, with the exception of interactions that are outside of the MVC pattern, such as the setting of the user interface
    CliUtils
    A set of utils available to the CLI user interface to update the internal model representation and visualize the game.
    Color
    enum representing the possible colors of the workers
    Connection
    Handles communication between a client and the server on the server's side.
    ConnectionState
    Finite State Machine on the client side for the Connection Phase, which goes from the actual connection to the Server, to the choice or receival of the number of players, to the choice of name for every player
    Controller
    Implements the controller in the MVC pattern Validates the actions that the views want to take, and operates them on the model, which will in turn notify the changes back to the views
    ControllerInterface
    Interface for a controller It is implemented by two classes, Controller and Client Controller actually implements the logic, providing a way to modify the model Client only offers the interface to allow ClientView, the view on the client, to believe it is talking to a real controller.
    Deck
    Represents the deck of all possible cards in the game.
    DemeterPower
    Generate ActionTree and prune others ActionTrees for god Demeter
    Direction
    represents the directions in which a worker can move
    DisconnectionMenu
    Menu to show the disconnection
    EndOfTurnMenu
    Menu to voluntary end the turn
    ErrorVisualizer
    It is an error visualizer with an animated string that tends to disappear
    FeedObservable
    The observable class for the feed, which is the connection point from which the model delivers updates to the views
    FeedObserver
    Observer interface for the Feed, which incapsulates the communication from a model to a view There are 2 main classes that inherit from this one: ClientView and VirtualView ClientView exists on the client and actually contains the logic for the communications in the MVC pattern VirtualView exists on the server and only propagates notifies from the model through the connection with the client.
    Game
    stores information about the general state of the game, such as what cards compose the deck, whose turn it is and what are the possible actions for the current player's turn
    GameState
    FSM for the main phase of game, the one in which workers move and build
    GraphicsElementsCLI
    Encapsulates all the loadings of textures for the CLI.
    GraphicsLoader
    It is a Loader of all graphics elements of GUI.
    Group3D
    It is an extends of javafx Group that makes the 3D group ratable and zoomable
    GuiApp
    The launcher for the graphical user interface based on JavaFX.
    HephaestusPower
    Generate ActionTree and prune others ActionTrees for god Hephaestus
    HeraPower
    Generate ActionTree and prune others ActionTrees for god Hera
    HestiaPower
    Generate ActionTree and prune others ActionTrees for god Hestia
    HypnusPower
    Generate ActionTree and prune others ActionTrees for god Hypnus
    IncorrectStateException
    A runtime exception dealing with the state of an object being corrupted.
    InvalidActionTreeGenerationException
    A runtime exception dealing with encountered in the creation of the action tree.
    Launcher
    Generic launcher to run one among CliApp, GuiApp and ServerApp.
    LimusPower
    Generate ActionTree and prune others ActionTrees for god Limus
    LoseMenu
    Menu of lose
    MapConvertible
    groups similar snippets of code from all the class that support map conversion
    Menu
    It is a super class for all menu.
    Message
    The mean of communication in the propagation of method calls through the architecture.
    MessageSynchronizer
    Handles the queue of messages to be executed on a node of the architecture.
    Messenger
    Contains all the methods related to the exchange of messages between the agents of the middleware.
    MinotaurPower
    Generate ActionTree and prune others ActionTrees for god Minotaur
    Model
    Master class of the model package, exposes most methods and is the head of the reference structure of the model package
    ModelCLI
    Stores the data required for CLI representations.
    MoveAction
    represents the action of moving a worker, as performed by a player in their turn
    MoveAndForceAction
    represents the action of moving a worker, and in doing so causing an opponent's worker to change its position too, thereby forcing it
    NetworkInterface
    Interface to be implemented on all network handlers of the middleware.
    Observable<T>
    Generic Observable that only accepts a specific type of observer
    PanPower
    Generate ActionTree and prune others ActionTrees for god Pan
    PersistenceGame
    abstracts from game, keeping some information and adding some missing info objects of this class will contain the general info needed to save and load a game the turn archive will instead provide precise details about the actions taken in the turns
    Phase
    Enumerates the possible phases that the game can be in
    Piece
    Enumerates the possible building levels that can be build on a Space, including ground level
    PieceBag
    Represents the collection of finite pieces available to build.
    Player
    represents a player.
    PlayersMenu
    Menu to show the names and gods of players in game and reports who is the current player
    PowerStrategy
    Default class for generate ActionTree and to prune others ActionTrees
    PrintCLI
    Contains utilities to specify a style in printing text on the CLI.
    PrometheusPower
    Generate ActionTree and prune others ActionTrees for god Prometheus
    RectangleCLI
    The basic printable entity for the CLI graphics.
    RestoreState
    FSM on the client side that handles the possible restoration of a saved game
    SelectionCLI
    A CLI-oriented representation of a choice between a set of prior-defined possibilities.
    SelectPieceMenu
    Menu to chose the piece of a build move
    SelectTypeActionMenu
    Menu to chose the type of action
    Server
    The main node in the client-server architecture of the middleware.
    ServerApp
    The launcher for the server of a game.
    SetupAction
    represents the action of placing a worker on the board for the first time, as it happens during the setup of the game
    SetupState
    FSM for the Setup Phase, which covers the choice of cards and the positioning of the workers on the board
    Sex
    Enumerates the possibles sexes of the workers
    Space
    Represents each tile on the board Can be built upon with Pieces, and can have a Worker on
    SpaceCLI
    A CLI-oriented version of the Space class.
    Tower
    It is the collection of building in the 3D
    Turn
    aggregates multiple actions that belong to the same player, representing the more complex idea of turn
    TurnArchive
    stores memory of all the actions taken by the players during the game
    UserInterface
    interface for the user interfaces, which are the cli and the gui.
    UserInterfaceObservable
    Observable class for the interaction between the User Interfaces and the ClientView
    UserInterfaceObserver
    Observer interface for the communication from the User Interfaces to the View in the client
    View
    Superclass for all the types of view, which implements the basic logic of the view having a controller
    VirtualView
    View inheritor that simulates the presence of an actual view on the server side of the MVC pattern.
    WinMenu
    Menu of win
    Worker
    Represents a worker.
    Worker
    A single 3D worker of GUI
    ZeusPower
    Generate ActionTree and prune others ActionTrees for god Zeus
